column5: ok first let me say I blame Misfish for putting the idea in my head but however it happened I said something about it to my wife, she decided to get it for my birthday not for couple of months but she likes to buy early  now she figures I should try it out before she puts it away  I did not know it would be so heavy I read about the size but did not know  it was so big  I don't think it would fit in a trunk...takes up a lot of room in my jeep, and I do have the roof racks  but any how.....now I have to give it a try sunday if the rain holds off   and blowing it up...I need to find the best pump for that too      look out world  ,here I come  or orr
I have one of those double quick III hand pumps.They pump air on the up and down stroke .Great for filling up pool toys.Nice looking rig.Sure you'll have a ball with that.!!!!!
With all this rain,I think you should take it to the Notty.  Nice buddy.  I,ll be looking at one come the spring.
Come up here in the morning bud. You can use my pump. Try for some perch and what ever else bites.  I need to try my new UL combo.
Is that 2 person? Take me with you!
This is the one I got Terry. Works great for the price.  Airhead.12 volt  http://www.lebaron.ca/pdf_files_sp13/kwik_tek.pdf  CTC want 30 bucks. Go figure.
I can hold onto the side.
Guess I have a boat too. LOL
you bet just  mines bigger   just saying   lol
My canoe is like a yacht
time to look for a 2hp Honda kicker, slap that on the back and make miles in style  hope it helps you bring in plenty 'o' fish !
I have a 2.5 merc if I need travel long  distance and a 5 hp if I want to ski or wakeboard
